about_the_game:
Disclaimer: This game contains scenes of blood, violence and corpses

Welcome to the Backrooms, a place of endless s̶u̶f̶f̶e̶r̶i̶n̶g fun =)


Oh, my head. А? Where am I?

Does this place look familiar to you? Have you seen it before? Or is it just your mind playing tricks on you?
Start the adventures of one of the lost in the Backrooms. Try to get out of this hellish place.
̶F̶i̶n̶d̶ ̶t̶h̶e̶ ̶o̶t̶h̶e̶r̶ ̶l̶o̶s̶t̶ ̶o̶n̶e̶s there's no one here =)

Start your exploration from level 0, a completely deserted level, of yellow walls, wet carpets and fluorescent lights, the sound of which you will remember for the rest of your life. Will you find the way out of this level, or will you stay on it forever? You still have a lot to learn about this place.

In the game you will be able to:
  • Explore the infinity of size and the depth of loneliness at level 0 and all Backrooms.
  • Solve the puzzles that come your way.
  • Climb to get higher.
  • Lose your humanity as you explore the levels.
  • Have fun =)

Plunge into the depths of despair.


In this place there is no escape, the only way to stop your torment is death, or is not?
Are you alone? Or not? Are there other people here? So many questions.

But know this:
  • IT is already waiting for you at level 0.
  • The skin-stealers already want to peel your skin off.
  • The hounds are looking for you to eat you.
  • Partygoers want to s̶t̶e̶a̶l̶ ̶y̶o̶u̶ ̶t̶o̶ ̶m̶a̶k̶e̶ ̶y̶o̶u̶ ̶o̶n̶e̶ ̶o̶f̶ ̶t̶h̶e̶m̶ ̶o̶r̶ ̶k̶i̶l̶l̶ ̶y̶o̶u̶ ̶t̶o̶ ̶m̶a̶k̶e̶ ̶y̶o̶u̶ ̶a̶ ̶c̶a̶k̶e throw the best party for you =)
  • The balloon will SURE be leading you to the party. =)

name: The Backrooms: You've Been Here Before

short_description: You find yourself in Backrooms, and it's up to you to find a way out of this place. You are completely lost, in a world of endless corridors and liminal spaces. And no one knows what's waiting for you around the next corner.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, Russian
*languages with full audio support
